metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14654 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The Gluster file system through version 4.1.4 is vulnerable to abuse of the'features/index' translator. A remote attacker with access to mount volumescould exploit this via the 'GF_XATTROP_ENTRY_IN_KEY' xattrop to createarbitrary, empty files on the target server.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
